mapper.select: SELECT gspeed.id ,gspeed.user_id as userId ,gspeed.level1 ,gspeed.level2 ,gspeed.level3 ,(gspeed.level1 + gspeed.level2 + gspeed.level3) as level ,user.username as userUsername FROM gspeed, user WHERE gspeed.user_id = user.id AND gspeed.id = #{id}
SELECT gspeed.id FROM gspeed, user WHERE gspeed.user_id = user.id ORDER BY (gspeed.level1 + gspeed.level2 + gspeed.level3) ASC
